alert.note: Alert for Oahu in Honolulu (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 02 at 5:04PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM HST THIS EVENING FOR THE ISLAND OF OAHU IN HONOLULU COUNTY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...The island of Oahu in Honolulu County. * WHEN...Until 815 PM HST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding on roads, poor drainage areas, and in streams. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 504 PM HST, radar indicated heavy rain over portions of Leeward Oahu. Rain was falling at a rate of 0.5 to 1.5 inches per hour. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Makakilo, Kapolei, Kunia, Ewa Beach, Nanakuli, Waipahu, Barbers Point, Iroquois Point, Koolina, Kalaeloa Airport, Campbell Industrial Park, Lualualei and Maili. This advisory may need to be extended beyond 815 PM HST if flooding persists.
info.instruction: Stay away from streams, drainage ditches and low lying areas prone to flooding.
